verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Man of Sorrows! What a name newline For the Son of God who came; newline Ruined sinners to reclaim, newline Hallelujah! What a Savior!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Bearing shame and scoffing rude, newline In my place condemned He stood; newline Sealed my pardon with His blood, newline Hallelujah! What a Savior!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Guilty vile and helpless we, newline Spotless Lamb of God was He; newline Full atonement can it be, newline Hallelujah! What a Savior!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Lifted up was He to die, newline "It is finished!" was His cry; newline Now in heaven, exalted high, newline Hallelujah! What a Savior!

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: When He comes, our glorious King, newline All His ransomed home to bring; newline Then anew this song we'll sing, newline Hallelujah! What a Savior!
